name: Medieval Town
description:
This project was created during a 5 days period during Unity education at PISMO Novska.

Programmer: Timon Popović

Art: Flaticon(https://www.flaticon.com/), Pixabay(https://pixabay.com/)

Music: Fantasy Motion / Haven / One Bard Band / Village Ambiance / Tam Lin / The Lone Wolf
